    Creative Cyber Cats (M) Sdn. Bhd. Vacancies Remote Manager for Web Developers

    November 1, 2020

    TOC

    • Job Description
    • Company Overview
    • How To Apply

    Creative Cyber Cats (M) Sdn. Bhd. is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Remote Manager for Web Developers position. If you currently looking for new job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

    Job Description

    • Monthly commission of RM3000~4000
    • Working hours: 9AM~5PM, Mon~Fri.

    Responsibilities

    • Perform basic project management responsibilities including coding WP, CSS, JS, HTML, uploading, etc.
    • Managing a team of junior developers.
    • Management of sales and project acquisition.
    • Maintain daily progress reports whilst working remotely.

    Qualifications

    • At least 5 Year(s) of working experience or equivalent in the related field
    • Required Skill(s): CSS, HTML, WordPress, JavaScript.
    • Preferably Senior Executive specialized in IT/Computer - Software or equivalent.
    • English language proficiency is required.
    • Japanese language proficiency N4 or higher/equivalent is required.

    Company Overview

    Hi.
    We are Tokyo-based Japanese web designers.
    Last year, we successfulled launched our Taipei branch.
    With 15 years of web design experience, we've accumulated thousands of websites designed.

    We want to provide the same level of expertise and opportunity to customers here in Malaysia.

    よろしくお願いいたします。
    Creative Cyber Cats (M) Sdn. Bhd.

    How To Apply

    If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
    Hope you find your dream job in Penang, Johor, Kedah.
    Apply Online
